title: Troubled testmaker Talis Biomedical drops COVID plans, lays off 35% of remaining staff
author: Conor Hale
description: The point-of-care testmaker Talis Biomedical is undergoing a second wave of layoffs this year after struggling to get its COVID-19 diagnostic off the ground. | The point-of-care testmaker Talis Biomedical is undergoing a second wave of layoffs this year after struggling to get its COVID-19 diagnostic off the ground. It will make another 35% reduction in its headcount and is walking away from COVID testing altogether, pivoting instead to screeners for sexually transmitted diseases.
